content: the terrazzo tank top is a round-neck singlet with a textured mesh surface perfect on its own or over swimsuits bandeaus or sports bras this slouchy camisole is the comfiest thing you ll wear all summer this crochet camisole is worked up in the single_crochet column stitch which is the perfect stitch for drapey and airy projects this pattern is accompanied by a step-by-step video tutorial sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl skill level easy+ check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
